import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useAuth } from '../../context/AuthContext' import toast from 'react-hot-toast' const UserLogin: React.FC = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const { login } = useAuth() const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault() setLoading(true) try { await login({ email, password }) toast.success('Login successful!') navigate('/') } catch (error: any) { const errorMessage = error.response?.data?.error || error.message || 'Login failed' toast.error(errorMessage) console.error('Login error details:', error) } finally { setLoading(false) } } return (
{/* Left Section - White Background */}
{/* Logo */}
{/* Company Name */}

AMERICAN

GREEN SOLUTIONS

{/* Welcome Text */}

Welcome

User access

{/* Right Section - Green Background */}

User Login

Sign in to your account

{/* Email */}
setEmail(e.target.value)} required className="w-full pl-12 pr-4 py-3 bg-white rounded-lg text-gray-900 placeholder-gray-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-300" placeholder="Type your email" />
{/* Password */}
setPassword(e.target.value)} required className="w-full pl-12 pr-4 py-3 bg-white rounded-lg text-gray-900 placeholder-gray-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-300" placeholder="Type your password" />
Forgot password?
{/* Login Button */}
{/* Divider */}
{/* Admin Login Link */}
Admin user? Click here
) } export default UserLogin
